duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers, run the register, cashier, make purchase suggestions, and sometimes work with the food program.
Interact with many customers daily, provide fast and friendly service, and work with a fun, energetic team to accomplish daily goals.
Selling products to customers and providing excellent customer care.
Performing at a quick pace while having fun and working as part of a team.
Coming up with great ideas to solve problems and thinking quickly to offer suggestions.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred.
